name: Duergar Battle Smith's Iron Defender (Spider Form)
languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The iron defender can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Vigilant
traits.desc: The iron defender can't be surprised.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) poison damage.

actions.name: Repair (3/Day)
actions.desc: The magical mechanisms inside the iron defender restore 2d8 + 2 hit points to itself or to one construct or object within 5 feet of it.

reactions.name: Defensive Pounce
reactions.desc: The iron defender imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of one creature it can see that is within 5 feet of it, provided the attack roll is against a creature other than the iron defender.

bio: A mechanical spider companion for the Duergar Battle Smith.
